Title: Keeper of the Ossuary
Description:
Greetings, $n. While I continue to search for the remaining blue dragons, I could use your aid in another matter.

Alexstrasza and I plan on laying to rest the remaining essences of Malygos and Sindragosa. She has held on to their lingering essences after both were slain years ago.

Senegos said there was a time where dragons would be laid to rest in the Veiled Ossuary. Unfortunately, the place is a mess.

He's gone ahead to clean the area up with Stellagosa. Could you aid them?
ObjectivesText: Meet Senegos in the Veiled Ossuary.
CompletionText: Ah, here to help are we?

Objectives.Text: Speak to Senegos within the Veiled Ossuary
